content: this over size crochet top is a simple two panel project it s beginner friendly and easy to follow along for all levels this pattern includes an 9 page written pattern and photo tutorial as well as a link to the video tutorial to make it as smooth as possible this pattern includes us women s sizes xs-xxl any questions you may come across in making this pattern will be answered inside but if not feel free to message me materials #4 medium weight yarn i used scheepjes stone washed xl #4 medium weight yarn 75 meter/82 yards per skein color a = 841 moon stone color b = 852 lemon quartz crochet hook size 6 mm scissors yarn needle stitch markers notes 1 in this pattern made as us women s xs s m l xl xxl 2 this top is made in 2 separate pieces and then join them together front and back panels are made the same 3 this top designed to be an over size 4 this pattern is a 4 row repeat *row 2-5 5 this pattern is in multiples of 2+3 6 in this picture i have demonstrated with size small yarn needed color a 440 480 520 580 620 660 yards color b 210 230 250 280 300 320 yards gauge blocked 12 double_crochet x 6 row = 4 measurements after blocked xs = 24 33 width a cross back x 18 length s = 26 33 width across back x 18 length m = 28 33 width across back x 18 length l = 30 33 width across back x 20 66 length xl = 32 33 width across back x 20 66 length xxl = 34 33 width across back x 20 66 length thanks for stopping by happy crocheting
